channel.title: Erlang on Random Bits of Wisdom
channel.description: Recent content in Erlang on Random Bits of Wisdom

item.title: [Quote] Ten Years of Erlang
item.description: It’s probably not too important, in the grand scheme of things, whether you are using a language like Erlang or not. While I do feel it’s under-used and under-rated, the biggest benefit of it is not in running a system that uses it. The biggest benefit comes from learning about the fundamentals of solid system design, and internalizing its lessons in a practical context. @media (max-width: 640px) { .
